channel.title: jupyter on Owlglass
channel.description: Recent content in jupyter on Owlglass

item.title: Org Mode - Python/Jupyter Example
item.description: Create a Session Initialize server with org-babel-exp-src-block. Afterwards, ‘Enter’ in the sourceblock will execute. print('ello, world!') Create a plot import matplotlib.pyplot as plt fig, ax = plt.subplots() ax.plot([1, 2, 3, 4], [1, 4, 2, 3]) pass Ocaml print_string "Hello world!\n"
